desc: mProjectQL reprojects a single image to the scale defined in a FITS header template file. The program produces a pair of images: the reprojected image and (optionally) an 'area' image consisting of the fraction input pixel sky area that went into each output pixel. This 'quick-look' version (see mProject and mProjectPP for other algorithms) interpolates the input pixels to find an approximate value to us for the output.

arguments.name: template_file
arguments.desc: FITS header file used to define the desired output.

arguments.name: hdu
arguments.desc: Optional HDU offset for input file.

arguments.name: weight_file
arguments.desc: Optional pixel weight FITS file (must match input).

arguments.name: fixedWeight
arguments.desc: A weight value used for all pixels.

arguments.name: threshold
arguments.desc: Pixels with weights below this level treated as weight 0.

arguments.name: borderstr
arguments.desc: Single border width number or pixel polygon pair list for masking.

arguments.name: fluxScale
arguments.desc: Scale factor applied to all pixels.

arguments.name: expand
arguments.desc: Expand output image area to include all of the input pixels.

arguments.name: fullRegion
arguments.desc: Do not 'shrink-wrap' output area to non-blank pixels.
